text: Hands down one of the best fish farm in Asia! Super friendly staffs there, even offered durian and drinks! They have a huge collection of rare high quality Kois imported directly from Japan. Highly recommended to all fish lovers out there!

Went to seek for advice to properly maintain pond water. Staff here were all friendly and very helpful! They are all extremely knowledgeable in this field. Highly recommended if you are still new to the hobby!

Very pretty koi fishes of very high quality, imported straight from japan. But prices are very steep small 6 inch long koi fishes start at $200+ EACH. If you're looking for koi fishes below $100 don't come here you're better off at other large famous fish farms selling local koi.

They were extremely kind and patient while answering my inquiries about raising kois and pond maintenance, their kois were well taken care of and staff was friendly and knowledgeable. Definitely will come back!
The service was great throughout my purchase. The fishes were healthy and well maintained as well. Will definitely purchase again!
